balanceOf().details: Get the current balance in the escrow

depositToken(address,uint256).details: Deposit IERC20 token to the escrow

getIssuanceBalances(uint256).details: Get the balance information about all tokens of the issuance.

params.issuanceId: The id of issuance to check balance

getIssuanceBalances(uint256).return: The balance of all tokens about this issuance.

getUserBalances(address).details: Get the balance information about all tokens of the user.

params.userAddress: The user address to check balance

getUserBalances(address).return: The balance of all tokens about this user.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

issuanceBalanceOf(uint256).details: Get the ETH balance of an issuance

params.issuanceId: The id of the issuance to check ETH balance.

issuanceTokenBalanceOf(uint256,address).details: Get the ERC20 token balance of an issuance

params.issuanceId: The id of the issuance to check ERC20 token balance.

migrateIssuanceBalances(uint256,uint256).details: Migrate the balances of one issuance to another Note: The balances should not have duplicate entries for the same token.

params.newIssuanceId: The id of the issuance to where the balance is migrated
params.oldIssuanceId: The id of the issuance from where the balance is migrated

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

processTransfers(bytes).details: Process transfer actions between users and issuance.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

tokenBalanceOf(address).details: Get the balance of the requested IERC20 token in the escrow

params.token: The IERC20 token to check balance

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.amount: The amount of Ethers to withdraw

withdrawToken(address,uint256).details: Withdraw IERC20 token from the escrow
